item.description:
FOR THE PAST 9 YEARS, many Republicans in Washington, DC have acted like pale
imitations of Democrats. Not surprisingly, the American people turned away. Now the
Republican grassroots is taking back the party to its conservative principles. Common sense
liberty-oriented conservatives are fighting to save the soul of the GOP and return it to the ideals
of leaders like Sen. Barry Goldwater, Pres. Ronald Reagan, and Rep. Ron Paul.
JOIN WITH US

Saturday, November 7, 2009
Holiday Inn, Concord, NH
5:00 p.m.

featuring Dr. Tom Woods and Larry Lepard

Register now at www.nhrliberty.org

Everyone (or couple) who registers by Monday, October 26 will get a free copy of Dr. Woodsâ€™s book,
The Politically Incorrect Guide to American History.

All proceeds go to the RLCNH Republican Liberty PAC to support pro-Liberty Republican candidates for
the NH House and Senate in 2010.

Exercise your individual liberty. Come dressed as you please. .
item.name: Liberty in 2010 Reception
